item.title: Pete Buttigieg Doesn’t Have a Time Machine
item.description: It means little that he can half-heartedly break from aspects of the Democratic Party’s record that he now realizes are controversial.

item.title: The Reporting on the Gaza War Is Fundamentally Broken
item.description: ‘Colonizer’ bad. ‘Colonized’ good. This worldview has warped coverage to an alarming degree.

item.title: Religious Liberty Is Everyone’s Fight

item.title: Abrego Garcia Faces Justice
item.description: The administration has finally availed itself of the obvious option.
